thread.title: Louie Anderson on Playing a Woman OnScreen and Finding Material on Stage
thread.title_full: Louie Anderson on Playing a Woman On-Screen and Finding Material on Stage - WSJ

author: John Jurgensen
title: Louie Anderson on Playing a Woman OnScreen and Finding Material on Stage
text:
During one of comedian Louie Anderson’s recent stand-up shows, the Minnesota native joked about people from the Midwest (“the complain belt”), his size (“If I get one more X on my clothes I’ll be next year’s Super Bowl”), and his late father’s tyrannical ways, recalling a midnight interrogation over some butter left out of the fridge.
Then, at the end of his set, Mr. Anderson shifted into self-reflection. Musing on habits he...
